item.description:
The plan

Meet at South Station at 4.30pm.

Train leaves south Station at 4.45 and arrives in Providence at 5.50pm. I don't know providence very well so do the people who are meeting us down there want to suggest a meeting place or can we meet at the station? If you plan on meeting us at the Station let me know, my cell phone is 617 840 5142 . Or you can just call and find out where we are.

Coming back, the last train leaves at 10pm which is a bit early but there is a Greyhound which most of us are planning on getting to get us back into Boston at 1am.

If people can't make the 4.45 train, they leave every two hours so just get a later one and call my cell phone.

See you tomorrow.

Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Providence - WaterFire night
